entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is a giant spider introduced in the text as Hagrid's pet. It is described as having many sons and daughters who do not harm Hagrid on its command.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person mentioned in the text as being friends with Harry. Aragog's sons and daughters do not harm him on his command.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog, which Harry yells to get into the car.

relationships.description: Aragog protects Hagrid from its sons and daughters.
There is no relationship mentioned between Aragog and Fang in the text.
Harry is frightened by Aragog and its many sons and daughters.
Ron is also frightened by Aragog and its many sons and daughters.
